data.text: Afei Hiob buaeɛ sɛ,
“Mate nsɛm bebree a ɛte sɛ yeinom;
Mo kasa tentene no mma awieeɛ anaa?
Sɛ mo na mowɔ me tebea yi mu a,
Nanso, anka mɛhyɛ mo den;
“Nanso sɛ mekasa a, ɔyea a mete no remmoto;
Ao Onyankopɔn, ampa ara woama mabrɛ;
Woakyekyere me, ma abɛyɛ adansedie;
Onyankopɔn to hyɛ me so tete me wɔ nʼabufuo mu
Nnipa bue wɔn ano di me ho fɛw;
Onyankopɔn de me ama abɔnefoɔ.
Na biribiara kɔ yie ma me, nanso ɔdwerɛɛ me;
nʼagyantofoɔ atwa me ho ahyia,
Ɔba me so ɛberɛ biara;
“Mapam ayitoma akata me wedeɛ so
Agyaadwotwa ama mʼani ayɛ kɔɔ;
Nanso, me nsa nyɛɛ basabasayɛ biara
“Ao asase, nkata me mogya so;
Seesei mpo, me danseni wɔ soro;
Me ɔdimafoɔ yɛ mʼadamfo
ɔgyina onipa anan mu di ma no wɔ Onyankopɔn anim
“Mfeɛ kakra bi akyi
